title: Show Some Respect
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: Bucks-Nets, Suns advance past the Nuggets and more!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones raves about Game 4 of Bucks-Nets bringing us back to a different time in playoff lore (1:34), and the Suns finishing off the Nuggets despite the lack of public adulation (13:24). Plus, an IYHH including “funny money” becoming accepted currency in El Salvador (27:51), and your voicemails from when you came up against a future pro and lost (36:54)!

IYHH Stories

  1. @wapodavenport says you are now free to move about the cosmos…if you can afford it: https://wapo.st/2TUHn6b
  2. @jeffgernst on Bitcoin to become a national currency in El Salvador: https://bit.ly/3pZoOd5
